name: FromOverHere Ltd
goal: FromOverHere provides tailored strategy solutions to help plan for the future and respond to changing strategic contexts. We support governments, NGOs and businesses to work across boundaries, make better decisions and collaborate effectively together.  In particular we work on System Stewardship, namely building strategic coherence, public engagement and strategic foresight capabilities of governments across the world.
interests: Development, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Look at European Strategy and Policy Analysis System (ESPAS)
Also the developments of foresight and public engagement innovations across the EU ecosystem.
Also occasionally engage with EAS
